annotations: Success-driven, skilled student with a proven ability to succeed in multiple work environments, experience in working with start-ups, and a hunger for success. Demonstrated ability to evaluate problems, provide solutions, meet deadlines, and work internationally in five different languages, this highly organized, self-driven, aspiring tech mogul and OU grad is yet to lose an election since second grade. Having accumulated 3 years of work experience in four years of college, you may hire her from the January of 2022.

ENGINEERING FELLOWSHIP TO ITALY IN 2018 ● MERIT NRTW SCHOLARSHIP IN 2017 & 2018 ● DEAN’S HONOR ROLL IN ‘19, ’20 & ’21 ● ENTREPRENEURIAL FELLOWSHIP ’20, ‘21 ● WRIGHTSMAN SCHOLARSHIP IN ‘20 ● STUDENT GOVERNMENT ELECTION BOARD MEMBER ’19 ● UNDERGRAD STUDIES COMMITEE STUDENT REP. ● FOUNDER + PRESIDENT OF TECH ORGANIZATION AT OU ● FOUNDER + DIRECTOR OF FAIR EDUCATION FOR ALL

ADOBE SUITE, CANVA, POWER BI, DYNAMICS 365 CRM, HOOTSUITE, GOOGLE ANALYTICS, SHOPIFY, WORDPRESS + UI/UX, WEB DESIGN, HTML, CSS, JAVASCRIPT, WIREFRAMING, PROJECT MANAGEMENT, DIGITAL ART, DIGITAL MARKETING AND STRATEGY, E-COMMERCE MANAGEMENT, DATA ANALYTICS
AUG 2020 – NOV 2021 • Part-Time • Oxygen, London, UK (Remote)

Build, set-up, and run website analytics; oversee social media marketing, SEO, training of users in new/existing IT systems; oversee IT initiatives and working with stakeholders and provide strategic advice on the use of technology to achieve goals; make sure tech team is at max productivity; conduct client presentations, communicate with stakeholders overseas; deliver status reports + projects on time, within budget. Helped gain 100% more followers on social media

Responsibilities included communication and collaboration with teams to meet project objectives; creating marketing collaterals, digital art for presentations, pitching SAAS product; analyze and review research papers, lead meetings, monitor team progress.

Responsibilities included communication and collaboration with teams to meet project objectives, employed time management; reviewed and analyzed survey data, organized meetings, took minutes, monitored team progress; researched, collected, collated data; assisted with project planning + execution; adopted Agile Scrum methods, assisted in project management and process improvements.
Specialized coursework: Technical Project Management, Database design in SQL, OOP, Web development, Statistics, UX/UI, Data Analytics in R & Python
Intense cultural and language immersion program with an engineering emphasis on full tuition scholarship.
